plot: Max (Corraface) returns home after ten years spent in jail for a crime of passion. He then falls in love with a beautiful woman (Galiena), who happens to be his brother's (Barr) wife...
title: Caín, el preferido
plot_es: Max (Corraface) returns home after ten years spent in jail for a crime of passion. He then falls in love with a beautiful woman (Galiena), who happens to be his brother's (Barr) wife...
plot_en: Max (Corraface) returns home after ten years spent in jail for a crime of passion. He then falls in love with a beautiful woman (Galiena), who happens to be his brother's (Barr) wife...
